title: Rope! and Other Tales of Bondage and Humiliation
description: "Compelling, playful, intelligent and highly erotic. If you like your reading (this is more than mere erotica) to be intelligent, thought provoking and surprising, I cannot recommend [Scylla's work] too highly." -Janice Morgan Stevens. From the author of such searing books as Late Night Confessions and Love Bombs comes a stunning collection of novelettes about bondage, humiliation and more! Beginning with the unforgettable Rope!, Scylla will take you down dark, forbidden paths into the kind of love and sensuality some people find repellant and others the spice of life. The perfect book for anyone who has ever dreamed of practicing BDSM and for anyone who has ever experience its thrills.
author: Scylla
